meanings.definition: A type of racing car used in stock car racing.
meanings.sent1: The stockcars zoomed around the track at high speeds.
meanings.sent2: Fans cheered as the stockcars raced past the finish line.
meanings.sent3: The stockcars decided to have a race against the bicycles for fun.
meanings.sent4: The stockcars roared like lions as they raced around the oval track.
meanings.sent5: The shiny stockcars gleamed under the bright stadium lights.

meanings.definition: Cars used in stock car racing.
meanings.sent1: My favorite part of the race is watching the stockcars speed by.
meanings.sent2: The drivers prepared their stockcars for the upcoming competition.
meanings.sent3: The stockcars honked at each other playfully before the race started.
meanings.sent4: The stockcars were like a pack of wild horses thundering down the track.
meanings.sent5: The colorful stockcars painted a vibrant picture against the gray asphalt.
